column5: Is there a convenient place to buy beer or whiskey after crossing the border from International Falls into Fort Frances. Thanx in advance.
look deeper into this bullitin board - there's lots of details about the beer store in fort frances including web sites.phish

TimmeB:Take a look at http://www.thebeerstore.ca/ultimate/types_of_beer.aspBy doing so, you will find The Beer Store is located at 343 FIFTH ST. EAST, FORT FRANCES.The Liquor Control Board of Ontario in Fort Frances is at 210 THIRD STREET EAST, FORT FRANCES.Their web site is:http://www.lcbo.com/index_eng.htmlTight lines! Jay
